data.query: SELECT "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID" AS "INSTANCE_ID", "ANSWER_DOK_NR"."ANSWER" AS "DOSSIER_NR", "FORM"."NAME" AS "FORM", "LOCATION"."NAME" AS "COMMUNITY", "USER"."USERNAME" AS "USER", "APPLICANT_VIEW"."APPLICANT", (SELECT LISTAGG("NAME", ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY "NAME") FROM INTENTIONS WHERE "INSTANCE_ID" = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AS "INTENT", "ANSWER_STREET"."ANSWER" AS "STREET", 'redac' AS "STATE", GET_INST_STATE_DESCRIPTION('redac') AS "STATE_DESCRIPTION" FROM "INSTANCE" LEFT JOIN "APPLICANT_VIEW" ON ( "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID" = "APPLICANT_VIEW"."INSTANCE_ID" ) JOIN "INSTANCE_LOCATION" ON ( "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID" = "INSTANCE_LOCATION"."INSTANCE_ID" ) JOIN "LOCATION" ON ( "INSTANCE_LOCATION"."LOCATION_ID" = "LOCATION"."LOCATION_ID" ) JOIN FORM ON ( "INSTANCE"."FORM_ID" = "FORM"."FORM_ID" ) JOIN "USER" ON ( "INSTANCE"."USER_ID" = "USER"."USER_ID" ) JOIN "ANSWER" "ANSWER_DOK_NR" ON ( "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID" = "ANSWER_DOK_NR"."INSTANCE_ID" AND "ANSWER_DOK_NR"."QUESTION_ID" = 6 AND "ANSWER_DOK_NR"."CHAPTER_ID" = 2 AND "ANSWER_DOK_NR"."ITEM" = 1 ) LEFT JOIN "ANSWER" "ANSWER_STREET" ON ( "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID" = "ANSWER_STREET"."INSTANCE_ID" AND "ANSWER_STREET"."QUESTION_ID" = 93 AND "ANSWER_STREET"."CHAPTER_ID" = 101 AND "ANSWER_STREET"."ITEM" = 1 ) JOIN "FORM_GROUP_FORM" ON ( "FORM_GROUP_FORM"."FORM_ID" = "INSTANCE"."FORM_ID" ) WHERE "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_STATE_ID" = GET_INST_STATE_ID_BY_NAME('redac') AND "FORM_GROUP_FORM"."FORM_GROUP_ID" = 141 ORDER BY DOSSIER_NR
